messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Alright crew. We all want a clean shift, good research, good pay. Faffing around gets heads blown off, capiche? Have a good one.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Turn your sensors up before you get murdered in maint and noone even notices you died

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hey, Detective here, i am now the captain.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Xenobiology Lab.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: According to information provided by the ai. your loved captin is dead. i will resume command untill a worthy captin can arrive
